data.prayer: Please, convict the 7,953 believers in Marlborough, New Zealand to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Marlborough, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Marlborough.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Marlborough.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Marlborough, New Zealand.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Lao people.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Marlborough, New Zealand to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Lord, help the people of Marlborough, New Zealand to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Marlborough, New Zealand.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
